mapper.sql: select o.open_id, o.term_id, o.course_id, o.teacher_id, o.class_time, o.class_location, o.max_students, (select count(*) from edu_student_course sc where sc.open_id = o.open_id and sc.status != '2') as selected_num, o.status, o.score_deadline, o.is_finished, o.finish_time, o.usual_ratio, o.exam_ratio, o.create_by, o.create_time, o.update_by, o.update_time, o.remark, t.term_name, c.course_code, c.course_name, c.credit, u.nick_name as teacher_name from edu_course_opening o left join edu_term t on o.term_id = t.term_id left join edu_course c on o.course_id = c.course_id left join edu_teacher et on o.teacher_id = et.teacher_id left join sys_user u on et.user_id = u.user_id

mapper.select: select o.open_id, o.term_id, o.course_id, o.teacher_id, o.class_time, o.class_location, o.max_students, (select count(*) from edu_student_course sc where sc.open_id = o.open_id and sc.status != '2') as selected_num, o.status, o.score_deadline, t.term_name, c.course_code, c.course_name, c.credit, (select count(*) from edu_student_course sc where sc.open_id = o.open_id and sc.score is null and sc.status = '0') as pending_count from edu_course_opening o left join edu_term t on o.term_id = t.term_id left join edu_course c on o.course_id = c.course_id where o.teacher_id = #{teacherId} and o.status = '1' and exists (select 1 from edu_student_course sc where sc.open_id = o.open_id and sc.score is null and sc.status = '0') order by o.term_id desc, o.open_id
